system.special: SM Wep, Accurate, Felling (8), Razor Sharp, Tearing
system.note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Boltgun (Stalker) of the Excorcists Chapter. When fired after a Full Action Aim, scores Righteous Fury on a 9 or 10.
